abstract: Michelle Higgins Practical Traveler column; travelers looking to enjoy the fall foliage in New England will find most roads clear, hotels open and plenty of deals.
snippet: Leaf peepers in the Northeast will find that most storm-damaged roads have been repaired, and hotels are open and offering deals.
lead_paragraph: Leaf peepers in the Northeast will find that most storm-damaged roads have been repaired, and hotels are open and offering deals.

headline.main: After the Storm, Fall Foliage Deals
headline.print_headline: After the Storm, Fall Foliage Deals
headline.seo: After Irene, New England Foliage Deals
